pages.text: $(turtlemancy)Turtle Haters Rituals$() are those rituals that can only be performed by the Turtlemancers who treat turtles the wrong way. The $(thing)altar$() must be charged with $(#d63031)Turtles Curses$() to perform any of this rituals. $(br2)All sacrifices must be $(l)adult$() creatures.

pages.title: Ritual of the Magma Heart
pages.description: This ritual will grant you a $(l:turtlemancy:equipment/magma_heart)$(item)Magma Heart$().

pages.title: Ritual of Death and Life
pages.description: This ritual will kill a grown turtle and will create a $(turtlemancy)$(l)baby turtle$() in return.

pages.title: Ritual of Death and Death
pages.description: With this machiavellian ritual you can obtain as a reward the $(item)Wither Skeleton skull.$()

pages.title: Ritual of Forgiveness
pages.description: This is a redention ritual which will grant you the $(item)Nether Star of Forgiveness$().
